replies.body: Imagine Dragons absolutely rocked that song.
I was thinking that was Imagine Dragons but is it really?
Whoever it is, maybe we will get to see them perform it live for the Finals in Korea.
YES DO IT RIOT PLEASE IG PERFORMANCE IN FINALS!
[Here is the tweet from IG](https://twitter.com/Imaginedragons/status/512348270882873344)

"A creative collaboration by Imagine Dragons and Riot Games."

I was not prepared.
The collaboration was not in {{champion:67}} seriously Ive got a {{champion:26}} goosebumps and I could hardly stay sitting on my {{champion:22}}
my brain shut down when I saw that not only is it imagine dragons, and not only is it a league of legends video, but they said league is their favorite game <3

> my brain shut down 

You might want to get that checked :P
OH MY GOD RIOT< YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAASSSSSSSSSSS > #goosebumps
It straight up gave me goosebumps watching this :O GJ RIOT, YOU HAVE EARNED YOUR NAME BACK AGAIN!!!!
Meanwhile on the east coast.................attempting to connect.
Meanwhile everywhere, people still don't realize that the people who make these cinematics don't work on the servers...
Meanwhile im on east coast wondering who these people that have these issues are.
Earned their name back again? Bro, they never lost it.
*cough cough* Azir released and immediately disabled despite taking peoples money *cough cough*

And you act like people are never going to be able to play Azir again and that RIOT just took the money. People will get their precious champion that they were so impatient for. As it always has been.
This music video gave many of us the #goosebumps
anything is better then the performance last Worlds {{item:3151}}
It was pretty good but i guess opinions.
The goosebumps are real.
Riot, you wouldn't happen to have these guys doing a live preformance at finals are you? ;)

that would be the single best thing to ever happen to E-sports... no joke. A huge and immensely popular music group performing at an E-sports event?  If it's happened before i havent heard of it, and it would attract the attention on non-gamers as well.
Umm... last year at the LCS finals? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mWU4QvC09uM
How many people know who Cystal Method are? I'm not one of them. Never heard one of their songs before this. Now Imagine Dragons, though. Everyone's heard Radioactive and Demons.
It's unlikely as it's in Korea
Imagine Dragons travels all over{{summoner:12}}
#IMAGININEDRAGONS@FINALS
So this is what you've been up to ignoring Azir's progress....I have to admit, I'm not saying it wasn't worth it, but for people who don't give a crap about Worlds, they're still pissed.

Yup, because the same guys who made this are also the ones who can fix the problem. Yes! You're so good at this!

Oooh yeah. They also made this WHOLE VIDEO in the one day that Azir has been down. Had Imagine Dragons record the music and everything.

Isn't it great to be right?

{{summoner:4}} THE HYPE TRAIN IS REALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Comparing this to all the other seasons (1-3), I am so hyped for this final, it's unreal

There are no words.
Though, I will ask Riot to stop purposefully making things that are the equivalent of visual masturbation.
Some of us have to sleep, you know

IMAGINE DRAGONS + RITO
TYTYTYTYTYTYTY
ILY RITO
Video games? Forget that. Riot, you're starting to become a real contender in the music world. This song is incredible.
It was a collaboration with Imagine Dragons; Riot did not make this video themselves.
They DID make the Pentakill album though.
OMG RITO PLS MAKE AN ANIME!
the day in a life of a teemo. 0-50-0 gg
With the animations they do, id love to see an anime of their lore XD I think it would be epic.
Love some dragons, love league. What a beautiful mashup! <3
TEESSEEMM WILL WIN THE LEAGUE OF {{champion:119}} CHAMPIONSHIP
Said noone ever
Imagine dragons absolutely killed it. Now i want to see it be performed.
im crying these are real tears
I {{item:3070}} a little lol
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH
You can't stop the pizza fingers :_)
The one staring at the defeat the screen in the hoodie is so me.....  {{summoner:10}}
Riot.... you are op......
